title: Jason Roy: England opener should go to the World Cup, says James Anderson
description: Opener Jason Roy should remain in England's World Cup squad despite not taking part in the series against New Zealand, according to James Anderson.

title: The Papers: XL bully ban and 'Murdoch team told Sunak not to quit'
description: Many of Saturday's papers focus on the American bully XL dog ban, after a man died in a suspected attack.

title: Ashton Kutcher resigns from anti-child abuse charity over support for rapist Danny Masterson
description: The actor says his letter of support for rape convict Danny Masterson was an "error in judgement".

title: Alfie Meadows: Met agrees pay-out for man injured in 2010 protest
description: Alfie Meadows was left with a brain injury after being struck in 2010 during a tuition fees protest.

title: Jadon Sancho: Erik ten Hag unsure if winger will play for Man Utd again
description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag says he does not know if Jadon Sancho will play for the club again.

title: Super League: Leigh Leopards 20-19 Wakefield - Golden point drop-goal sends Trinity down
description: Wakefield are relegated from Super League after falling to a dramatic golden-point defeat at Leigh Leopards.

title: BMW PGA Championship: Rory McIlroy struggles amid chaotic scenes on 18th hole
description: Rory McIlroy battled through a chaotic last-hole to finish on the projected cut mark of one under par at the BMW PGA Championship.

title: New Zealand 71-3 Namibia: All Blacks run in 11 tries but Ethan de Groot sent off
description: New Zealand storm to their 50th win at the Rugby World Cup as they thrash Namibia, but lose Ethan de Groot to a late red card for a dangerous collision.

title: Libyan official rejects blame for flood disaster
description: An official tells the BBC people in Derna were told to flee but some did not take the threat seriously.

title: American bully XLs to be banned as dog attack victim named
description: It comes after a man died following a suspected American XL bully attack in Walsall on Thursday.

title: England v New Zealand: Dawid Malan's century gives England ODI series win - highlights

title: Windsor Castle crossbow intruder apologises to the King
description: Jaswant Singh Chail has admitted charges relating to the Christmas 2021 break-in at Windsor Castle.

title: Libya: BBC finds little foreign aid in flood-hit Derna

title: American bully XL owners speak of heartbreak at ban

title: England v New Zealand: Dawid Malan century seals series victory at Lord's
description: Dawid Malan's sublime century inspires England to a series-clinching hammering of New Zealand in the fourth and final one-day international at Lord's.

title: Marks & Spencer scraps plastic for paper bags

title: Trevor Noah jumps into fan's car to beat traffic in Johannesburg

title: O2 Academy Brixton can reopen once conditions are met - council

title: Gabby Logan gets damages over false tax avoidance claims

title: Lucy Letby to appeal against baby murder convictions

title: Davis Cup 2023: Andy Murray dedicates Davis Cup win to grandmother
